text: tanṟe dāsane (nabiye) oru rātriyil masjidul haṟāmil ninn masjidul akhsāyilēkk - atinṟe parisaraṁ nāṁ anugr̥hītamākkiyirikkunnu- niśāyātra ceyyiccavan etrayēā pariśud'dhan! nam'muṭe dr̥ṣṭāntaṅṅaḷil cilat addēhattin nāṁ kāṇiccukeāṭukkān vēṇṭiyatre at‌. tīrccayāyuṁ avan (allāhu) ellāṁ kēḷkkunnavanuṁ kāṇunnavanumatre
